reference.scope: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (2.12 ANGSTROMS) OF 119-463 IN COMPLEXES WITH ADP AND GDP
MUTAGENESIS OF HIS-201; ARG-235; 238-PRO--PRO-242; ARG-342; LYS-368 AND LYS-372

comment.text: Mitochondrial outer membrane protein which regulates mitochondrial fission. Promotes the recruitment and association of the fission mediator dynamin-related protein 1 (DNM1L) to the mitochondrial surface independently of the mitochondrial fission FIS1 and MFF proteins. Regulates DNM1L GTPase activity and DNM1L oligomerization. Binds ADP and can also bind GDP, although with lower affinity. Does not bind CDP, UDP, ATP, AMP or GTP. Inhibits DNM1L GTPase activity in the absence of bound ADP. Requires ADP to stimulate DNM1L GTPase activity and the assembly of DNM1L into long, oligomeric tubules with a spiral pattern, as opposed to the ring-like DNM1L oligomers observed in the absence of bound ADP. Does not require ADP for its function in recruiting DNM1L.
Expression is relatively high in heart, skeletal muscle, pancreas and kidney.

property.value: Expressed in sperm and 242 other tissues
P:positive regulation of protein targeting to membrane

feature.description: Abolishes nucleotide-binding, but not DNM1L recruitment; when associated with E-342; E-368 and E-372.
No effect on mitochondrial localization. Impairs DNM1L recruitment.
